system.requirements: Ork Weirdboy, Da Power of Waaagh!, WS 45, Willpower 35
system.effect: The character's Staff or any other Melee Weapon they are holding gains the Force Quality. If not holding a weapon, their Unarmed Melee Attacks gain the Force Quality.

description.value: The character's Staff or any other Melee Weapon they are holding gains the Force Quality. If not holding a weapon, their Unarmed Melee Attacks gain the Force Quality.
